title: Meiken Jolie (Belle and Sebastian)
synopsis: After befriending a white Pyrenees dog he names Belle, Sebastian sets out on a journey to find the mother he knows is still alive.
voices: ['Ohara, Noriko', 'Yokozawa, Keiko', 'Imanishi, Masao', 'Mine, Eken', 'Nomoto, Reizou', 'Matsuoka, Youko', 'Ichiryuusai, Harumi', 'Tsumura, Takashi', 'Kimotsuki, Kaneta', 'Nishio, Toku']
